channel.title: Home on PFE
channel.description: Recent content in Home on PFE

item.title: About
item.description: About Filip. Another guy from Sweden. Political science major with a deep interst in data-analysis and communication (marketing, PR, campaigns.). Contact me on pfesjostrand@gmail.com, for my resume see LinkedIn. About this site. This website was constructed using Hugo and blogdown, an R package built by Yihu Xie, the main benefit is that R code can be written in the contents as in the example below. Pretty neat. hi <- function(greeting) { c(greeting) } hi('Hello world!

item.title: About Filip Sjöstrand
item.description: ** This Hugo theme was ported from Ivy, a minimalist website generator built in Python. I don’t have time to document this theme. You have to read the source code to understand what it can do. All I can say for now is that I love it. It is clean, minimal, and responsive. I hope you will enjoy this theme. The source code is on Github. Happy hacking!

item.title: Note of appreciation
item.description: This website was created using the R package blogdown by Yihu Xie. Blogdown is cool becuase it allows easy use of Rmarkdown in the site, which basically means you can embed R code in the site, this is basically quite awesome if you want to discuss and showcase data analysis online. Since I am to impatient to tinker with site themes for the sake of being ‘unique’ it also uses an excellent minimialist theme, hugo-ivy, which was ported by Yihu Xie to Hugo and blogdown from the static website generator Ivy.
